functionalj.stream

Interface StreamPlusWithSegment<DATA>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RegExMatchResultStream, StreamPlus<DATA>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayBackedStreamPlus

    public interface StreamPlusWithSegment<DATA>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segment(int count)
      Segment the stream into sub stream with the fix length of count.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segment(ToIntFunction<DATA> segmentSize)
      Create a stream of sub-stream which size is derived from the value.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentAfter(Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting the element after the precondition is true.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition, Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition, Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition, boolean includeIncompletedSegment)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition, Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition, IncompletedSegment incompletedSegment)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentWhen(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream whenever the start condition is true.
      StreamPlus<DATA> streamPlus() 

    • Method Detail

      • streamPlus

        StreamPlus<DATA> streamPlus()

      • segment

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segment(int count)
        Segment the stream into sub stream with the fix length of count. The last portion may be shorter.

      • segment

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segment(ToIntFunction<DATA> segmentSize)
        Create a stream of sub-stream which size is derived from the value. If the segmentSize function return 0, the value will be ignored.

      • segmentWhen

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentWhen(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream whenever the start condition is true.

      • segmentAfter

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentAfter(Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting the element after the precondition is true.

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition,
                                                  Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively. Note: this method will not include the last sub stream even if the end condition is never been true before the stream ended.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition,
                                                  Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition,
                                                  IncompletedSegment incompletedSegment)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream
        incompletedSegment - specifying if the incomplete segment at the end should be included.

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<FuncList<DATA>> segmentBetween(Predicate<? super DATA> startCondition,
                                                  Predicate<? super DATA> endCondition,
                                                  boolean includeIncompletedSegment)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream
        includeIncompletedSegment - specifying if the incomplete segment at the end should be included.
